summary.span: 一个同步基元，也可用于进程间同步。

span.span: A synchronization primitive that can also be used for interprocess synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当两个或多个线程需要在同一时间访问共享的资源时，系统将需要有同步机制来确保一次只有一个线程使用的资源。When two or more threads need to access a shared resource at the same time, the system needs a synchronization mechanism to ensure that only one thread at a time uses the resource. 是一个同步基元，授予对共享资源为只有一个线程独占访问权限。 is a synchronization primitive that grants exclusive access to the shared resource to only one thread. 如果某一线程获取互斥体，想要获取该互斥体的第二个线程会挂起，直到第一个线程释放互斥体。If a thread acquires a mutex, the second thread that wants to acquire that mutex is suspended until the first thread releases the mutex. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 可以使用来请求所有权的互斥体的方法。You can use the method to request ownership of a mutex. 调用线程受到阻止，直到发生下列情况之一：The calling thread blocks until one of the following occurs: - 互斥体是发出信号，以指示它不属于。The mutex is signaled to indicate that it is not owned. 在此情况下，方法将返回`true`，调用线程是互斥体的所有权，并访问受该互斥体的资源。When this happens, the method returns `true`, and the calling thread assumes ownership of the mutex and accesses the resource protected by the mutex. 完成后访问资源，必须调用线程方法来释放 mutex 的所有权。When it has finished accessing the resource, the thread must call the method to release ownership of the mutex. 示例部分中的第一个示例说明了此模式。The first example in the Examples section illustrates this pattern. - 对的调用中指定的超时间隔具有方法`millisecondsTimeout`或`timeout`参数已过。The time-out interval specified in the call to a method that has a `millisecondsTimeout` or `timeout` parameter has elapsed. 在此情况下，方法将返回`false`，并调用线程不会进一步尝试获取 mutex 的所有权。When this happens, the method returns `false`, and the calling thread makes no further attempt to acquire ownership of the mutex. 在这种情况下，您应构建你的代码，以便由 mutex 保护资源的访问权限被拒绝对调用线程。In this case, you should structure your code so that access to the resource that is protected by the mutex is denied to the calling thread. 线程永远不会获取 mutex 的所有权，因为它不能调用方法。Because the thread never acquired ownership of the mutex, it must not call the method. 示例部分中的第二个示例说明了此模式。The second example in the Examples section illustrates this pattern. 类强制线程标识，因此只能由获得它的线程可以释放互斥体。The class enforces thread identity, so a mutex can be released only by the thread that acquired it. 与此相反，类不会强制线程标识。By contrast, the class does not enforce thread identity. 此外可以跨应用程序域边界传递了互斥体。A mutex can also be passed across application domain boundaries. 拥有 mutex 的线程可以请求中重复调用相同的互斥体而不会阻止其执行。The thread that owns a mutex can request the same mutex in repeated calls to without blocking its execution. 但是，调用线程必须方法相同数量的次数与释放 mutex 的所有权。However, the thread must call the method the same number of times to release ownership of the mutex. 因为类继承自，你还可以调用静态和方法来同步受保护资源的访问权限。Because the class inherits from , you can also call the static and methods to synchronize access to a protected resource. 如果线程终止时拥有互斥体，则认为该 mutex 已放弃。If a thread terminates while owning a mutex, the mutex is said to be abandoned. 互斥体的状态设置为终止状态，并且下一个等待线程获取所有权。The state of the mutex is set to signaled, and the next waiting thread gets ownership. 从.NET Framework 的版本 2.0获取已放弃的互斥体的下一个线程中引发。Beginning in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, an is thrown in the next thread that acquires the abandoned mutex. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中之前, 未不引发任何异常。Before version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, no exception was thrown. > [!CAUTION] > 放弃的 mutex 通常表明代码中的存在严重错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious error in the code. 线程退出时不释放互斥体，由 mutex 保护的数据结构不可能处于一致状态。When a thread exits without releasing the mutex, the data structures protected by the mutex might not be in a consistent state. 为请求 mutex 所有权的下一个线程可以处理此异常并继续操作，如果可以验证数据结构的完整性。The next thread to request ownership of the mutex can handle this exception and proceed, if the integrity of the data structures can be verified. 对于系统范围的 mutex，放弃的 mutex 可能指示应用程序已突然终止（例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器终止）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, an abandoned mutex might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). Mutex 有两种类型： 本地 mutex，未命名，并命名系统 mutex。Mutexes are of two types: local mutexes, which are unnamed, and named system mutexes. 本地 mutex 仅存在于进程中。A local mutex exists only within your process. 可由您具有对引用的过程中的任何线程表示该互斥体的对象。It can be used by any thread in your process that has a reference to the object that represents the mutex. 每个未命名对象表示单独的本地 mutex。Each unnamed object represents a separate local mutex. 已命名的系统互斥体，显示整个操作系统，可用于同步进程的活动。Named system mutexes are visible throughout the operating system, and can be used to synchronize the activities of processes. 您可以创建使用接受名称的构造函数表示命名的系统互斥体对象。You can create a object that represents a named system mutex by using a constructor that accepts a name. 可以在同一时间创建操作系统对象也可以在创建之前存在对象。The operating-system object can be created at the same time, or it can exist before the creation of the object. 可以创建多个表示同一命名系统 mutex 的 对象，还能使用 方法打开现有的命名系统 mutex。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system mutex, and you can use the method to open an existing named system mutex. > [!NOTE] > 在运行终端服务的服务器，命名的系统互斥体可以包含两个级别的可见性。On a server that is running Terminal Services, a named system mutex can have two levels of visibility. 如果其名称以前缀开头"Global\\"，互斥体是在所有终端服务器会话中可见。If its name begins with the prefix "Global\\", the mutex is visible in all terminal server sessions. 如果其名称以前缀开头"本地\\"，互斥体是仅在终端服务器会话中可见的创建位置。If its name begins with the prefix "Local\\", the mutex is visible only in the terminal server session where it was created. 在这种情况下，具有相同名称单独的互斥锁可以存在于每个服务器上的其他终端服务器会话。In that case, a separate mutex with the same name can exist in each of the other terminal server sessions on the server. 如果您不指定前缀创建已命名的互斥体时，它将前缀"本地\\"。If you do not specify a prefix when you create a named mutex, it takes the prefix "Local\\". 终端服务器会话中，只能由其前缀的名称不同的两个 mutex 有单独的互斥体，且都在终端服务器会话中对所有进程可见。Within a terminal server session, two mutexes whose names differ only by their prefixes are separate mutexes, and both are visible to all processes in the terminal server session. 也就是说，前缀名称"Global\\"和"本地\\"描述相对于终端服务器会话、 不相对于进程的互斥体名称的作用域。That is, the prefix names "Global\\" and "Local\\" describe the scope of the mutex name relative to terminal server sessions, not relative to processes. [!INCLUDE[backslash-mutex-note](~/includes/backslash-mutex.md)] ## Examples 此示例演示如何本地对象用于同步对受保护资源的访问。This example shows how a local object is used to synchronize access to a protected resource. 因为每个调用线程被阻止，直到它获取 mutex 的所有权，因此它必须调用方法来释放所有权的线程。Because each calling thread is blocked until it acquires ownership of the mutex, it must call the method to release ownership of the thread. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Mutex.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.mutex.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Mutex.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.mutex.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 在以下示例中，每个线程调用方法以获取互斥体。In the following example, each thread calls the method to acquire the mutex. 如果达到超时间隔，该方法返回`false`，并在线程获取 mutex 既不获得互斥锁保护的资源访问权。If the time-out interval elapses, the method returns `false`, and the thread neither acquires the mutex nor gains access to the resource the mutex protects. 只能由获得该互斥体的线程调用方法。The method is called only by the thread that acquires the mutex. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Mutex.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.mutex.class/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Mutex.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.mutex.class/vb/example2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`不是`null`并`initiallyOwned`是`true`，调用线程拥有 mutex，仅当通过此调用创建的命名的系统互斥体。If `name` is not `null` and `initiallyOwned` is `true`, the calling thread owns the mutex only if the named system mutex was created as a result of this call. 由于没有任何机制，用于确定是否已创建的命名的系统互斥体，最好是指定`false`为`initiallyOwned`时调用此构造函数重载。Since there is no mechanism for determining whether the named system mutex was created, it is better to specify `false` for `initiallyOwned` when calling this constructor overload. 可以使用构造函数，如果您需要确定初始所属权。You can use the constructor if you need to determine initial ownership. 此构造函数初始化表示命名的系统互斥体对象。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system mutex. 你可以创建多个对象表示同一命名系统互斥体。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system mutex. 如果命名互斥体已创建与访问控制安全性，并且调用方不具有，将引发异常。If the named mutex has already been created with access control security, and the caller does not have , an exception is thrown. 若要打开现有的已命名互斥体，使用所需的同步线程活动，这些权限，请参阅方法。To open an existing named mutex with only those permissions needed for synchronizing thread activities, see the method. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了局部互斥体，就像已调用构造函数。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local mutex is created, as if you had called the constructor. 在这种情况下，`createdNew`始终是`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 由于它们是系统范围内，命名的 mutex 可用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because they are system-wide, named mutexes can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. > [!NOTE] > 在运行终端服务的服务器，命名的系统互斥体可以包含两个级别的可见性。On a server that is running Terminal Services, a named system mutex can have two levels of visibility. 如果其名称以前缀开头"Global\\"，互斥体是在所有终端服务器会话中可见。If its name begins with the prefix "Global\\", the mutex is visible in all terminal server sessions. 如果其名称以前缀开头"本地\\"，互斥体是仅在终端服务器会话中可见的创建位置。If its name begins with the prefix "Local\\", the mutex is visible only in the terminal server session where it was created. 在这种情况下，具有相同名称单独的互斥锁可以存在于每个服务器上的其他终端服务器会话。In that case, a separate mutex with the same name can exist in each of the other terminal server sessions on the server. 如果您不指定前缀创建已命名的互斥体时，它将前缀"本地\\"。If you do not specify a prefix when you create a named mutex, it takes the prefix "Local\\". 终端服务器会话中，只能由其前缀的名称不同的两个 mutex 有单独的互斥体，且都在终端服务器会话中对所有进程可见。Within a terminal server session, two mutexes whose names differ only by their prefixes are separate mutexes, and both are visible to all processes in the terminal server session. 也就是说，前缀名称"Global\\"和"本地\\"描述相对于终端服务器会话、 不相对于进程的互斥体名称的作用域。That is, the prefix names "Global\\" and "Local\\" describe the scope of the mutex name relative to terminal server sessions, not relative to processes. [!INCLUDE[backslash-mutex-note](~/includes/backslash-mutex.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已命名的互斥体之间在两个单独进程中运行的线程发出信号。The following example shows how a named mutex is used to signal between threads running in two separate processes. 从两个或多个命令窗口中运行此程序。Run this program from two or more command windows. 每个进程创建对象，表示已命名的 mutex `MyMutex`。Each process creates a object that represents the named mutex `MyMutex`. 已命名的互斥体是系统对象的生存期的生存期由代表它的对象。The named mutex is a system object whose lifetime is bounded by the lifetimes of the objects that represent it. 已命名的互斥体时创建的第一个过程将创建其对象; 在此示例中，已命名的互斥体拥有的运行程序的第一个进程。The named mutex is created when the first process creates its object; in this example, the named mutex is owned by the first process that runs the program. 已命名的互斥体被销毁时所有表示它已发布。The named mutex is destroyed when all the objects that represent it have been released. 此示例中使用的构造函数重载不能告诉调用线程已命名的互斥体的初始所属权是否已授予。The constructor overload used in this example cannot tell the calling thread whether initial ownership of the named mutex was granted. 不应使用此构造函数请求的初始所有权，除非您可以确定线程将创建命名互斥体。You should not use this constructor to request initial ownership unless you can be certain that the thread will create the named mutex. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Mutex 2Arg Ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Mutex 2Arg Ctor Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Mutex 2Arg Ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Mutex 2Arg Ctor Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Mutex 2Arg Ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Mutex 2Arg Ctor Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`不是`null`并`initiallyOwned`是`true`，调用线程拥有命名互斥体才`createdNew`是`true`后调用。If `name` is not `null` and `initiallyOwned` is `true`, the calling thread owns the named mutex only if `createdNew` is `true` after the call. 否则，线程可以通过调用请求该互斥体方法。Otherwise the thread can request the mutex by calling the method. 此构造函数初始化表示命名的系统互斥体对象。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system mutex. 你可以创建多个对象表示同一命名系统互斥体。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system mutex. 如果命名互斥体已创建与访问控制安全性，并且调用方不具有权限，将引发异常。If the named mutex has already been created with access control security, and the caller does not have rights, an exception is thrown. 若要打开现有的已命名互斥体，使用所需的同步线程活动，这些权限，请参阅方法。To open an existing named mutex with only those permissions needed for synchronizing thread activities, see the method. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了局部互斥体，就像已调用构造函数。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local mutex is created, as if you had called the constructor. 在这种情况下，`createdNew`始终是`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 由于它们是系统范围内，命名的 mutex 可用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because they are system-wide, named mutexes can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. > [!NOTE] > 在运行终端服务的服务器，命名的系统互斥体可以包含两个级别的可见性。On a server that is running Terminal Services, a named system mutex can have two levels of visibility. 如果其名称以前缀开头"Global\\"，互斥体是在所有终端服务器会话中可见。If its name begins with the prefix "Global\\", the mutex is visible in all terminal server sessions. 如果其名称以前缀开头"本地\\"，互斥体是仅在终端服务器会话中可见的创建位置。If its name begins with the prefix "Local\\", the mutex is visible only in the terminal server session where it was created. 在这种情况下，具有相同名称单独的互斥锁可以存在于每个服务器上的其他终端服务器会话。In that case, a separate mutex with the same name can exist in each of the other terminal server sessions on the server. 如果您不指定前缀创建已命名的互斥体时，它将前缀"本地\\"。If you do not specify a prefix when you create a named mutex, it takes the prefix "Local\\". 终端服务器会话中，只能由其前缀的名称不同的两个 mutex 有单独的互斥体，且都在终端服务器会话中对所有进程可见。Within a terminal server session, two mutexes whose names differ only by their prefixes are separate mutexes, and both are visible to all processes in the terminal server session. 也就是说，前缀名称"Global\\"和"本地\\"描述相对于终端服务器会话、 不相对于进程的互斥体名称的作用域。That is, the prefix names "Global\\" and "Local\\" describe the scope of the mutex name relative to terminal server sessions, not relative to processes. [!INCLUDE[backslash-mutex-note](~/includes/backslash-mutex.md)] ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何使用已命名的互斥体之间的进程或线程发出信号。The following code example shows how a named mutex is used to signal between processes or threads. 从两个或多个命令窗口中运行此程序。Run this program from two or more command windows. 每个进程创建对象，表示已命名的互斥体"MyMutex"。Each process creates a object that represents the named mutex "MyMutex". 已命名的互斥体是系统对象。The named mutex is a system object. 在此示例中，其生存期由的生存期代表它的对象。In this example, its lifetime is bounded by the lifetimes of the objects that represent it. 第一个过程将创建其局部变量时，创建已命名的 mutex对象，并销毁时所有表示它已发布。The named mutex is created when the first process creates its local object, and destroyed when all the objects that represent it have been released. 已命名的 mutex 最初拥有的第一个进程。The named mutex is initially owned by the first process. 第二个进程和任何后续的进程等待前一进程释放命名的互斥体。The second process and any subsequent processes wait for earlier processes to release the named mutex. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`不是`null`并`initiallyOwned`是`true`，调用线程拥有命名互斥体才`createdNew`是`true`后调用。If `name` is not `null` and `initiallyOwned` is `true`, the calling thread owns the named mutex only if `createdNew` is `true` after the call. 否则，线程可以通过调用请求该互斥体方法。Otherwise the thread can request the mutex by calling the method. 使用此构造函数要应用于已命名的系统互斥体的访问控制安全性，在创建时，阻止其他代码互斥体的控制。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system mutex when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the mutex. 此构造函数初始化表示命名的系统互斥体对象。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system mutex. 你可以创建多个对象表示同一命名系统互斥体。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system mutex. 如果不存在已命名的系统互斥体，它被创建使用指定的访问控制安全性。If the named system mutex does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果命名互斥体存在，则忽略指定的访问控制安全性。If the named mutex exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 调用方具有对新创建的完全控制对象，即使`mutexSecurity`拒绝或无法授予当前用户对某些访问权限。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `mutexSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 但是，如果当前用户尝试获取另一个对象表示同一命名互斥体，使用构造函数或方法中，Windows 应用访问控制安全性。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named mutex, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果命名互斥体已创建与访问控制安全性，并且调用方不具有，将引发异常。If the named mutex has already been created with access control security, and the caller does not have , an exception is thrown. 若要打开现有的已命名互斥体，使用所需的同步线程活动，这些权限，请参阅方法。To open an existing named mutex with only those permissions needed for synchronizing thread activities, see the method. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了局部互斥体，就像已调用构造函数。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local mutex is created, as if you had called the constructor. 在这种情况下，`createdNew`始终是`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 由于它们是系统范围内，命名的 mutex 可用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because they are system-wide, named mutexes can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. > [!NOTE] > 在运行终端服务的服务器，命名的系统互斥体可以包含两个级别的可见性。On a server that is running Terminal Services, a named system mutex can have two levels of visibility. 如果其名称以前缀开头"Global\\"，互斥体是在所有终端服务器会话中可见。If its name begins with the prefix "Global\\", the mutex is visible in all terminal server sessions. 如果其名称以前缀开头"本地\\"，互斥体是仅在终端服务器会话中可见的创建位置。If its name begins with the prefix "Local\\", the mutex is visible only in the terminal server session where it was created. 在这种情况下，具有相同名称单独的互斥锁可以存在于每个服务器上的其他终端服务器会话。In that case, a separate mutex with the same name can exist in each of the other terminal server sessions on the server. 如果您不指定前缀创建已命名的互斥体时，它将前缀"本地\\"。If you do not specify a prefix when you create a named mutex, it takes the prefix "Local\\". 终端服务器会话中，只能由其前缀的名称不同的两个 mutex 有单独的互斥体，且都在终端服务器会话中对所有进程可见。Within a terminal server session, two mutexes whose names differ only by their prefixes are separate mutexes, and both are visible to all processes in the terminal server session. 也就是说，前缀名称"Global\\"和"本地\\"描述相对于终端服务器会话、 不相对于进程的互斥体名称的作用域。That is, the prefix names "Global\\" and "Local\\" describe the scope of the mutex name relative to terminal server sessions, not relative to processes. [!INCLUDE[backslash-mutex-note](~/includes/backslash-mutex.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全性的已命名的互斥体的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named mutex with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的互斥体。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named mutex. 如果不存在该互斥体，创建使用初始所有权以及访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用互斥体的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改该互斥体的权限。If the mutex does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the mutex, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the mutex. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开该互斥体。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the mutex with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入，并将其释放所需的权限打开该互斥体。After the permissions are changed, the mutex is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法尝试打开指定的命名系统互斥体。The method tries to open the specified named system mutex. 如果不存在的系统互斥体，此方法将引发异常而不是创建系统对象。If the system mutex does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system object. 若要创建的系统互斥体已存在时，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system mutex when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多个调用此方法使用的相同值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回这些对象表示同一命名的系统互斥体。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system mutex. 此方法的重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位 OR 运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许线程等待互斥体，并指定标志将允许线程调用方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the mutex, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method. 此方法不会请求 mutex 的所有权。This method does not request ownership of the mutex. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全性的已命名的互斥体的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named mutex with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的互斥体。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named mutex. 如果不存在该互斥体，创建使用初始所有权以及访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用互斥体的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改该互斥体的权限。If the mutex does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the mutex, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the mutex. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开该互斥体。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the mutex with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入，并将其释放所需的权限打开该互斥体。After the permissions are changed, the mutex is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`参数必须包含标志，以便允许线程等待互斥体，并标志，以使线程能够调用方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the mutex, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 方法尝试打开现有的已命名的互斥体。The method tries to open an existing named mutex. 如果不存在的系统互斥体，此方法将引发异常而不是创建系统对象。If the system mutex does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system object. 若要创建的系统互斥体已存在时，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system mutex when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多个调用此方法使用的相同值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回这些对象表示同一命名的系统互斥体。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system mutex. 此方法不会请求 mutex 的所有权。This method does not request ownership of the mutex. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全性的已命名的互斥体的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named mutex with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的互斥体。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named mutex. 如果不存在该互斥体，创建使用初始所有权以及访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用互斥体的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改该互斥体的权限。If the mutex does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the mutex, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the mutex. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开该互斥体。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the mutex with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入，并将其释放所需的权限打开该互斥体。After the permissions are changed, the mutex is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当某一线程获取互斥体 (例如，通过调用其方法)，它必须随后调用放弃 mutex 的所有权和取消阻止其他线程尝试获取 mutex 的所有权。Whenever a thread acquires a mutex (for example, by calling its method), it must subsequently call to relinquish ownership of the mutex and unblock other threads that are trying to gain ownership of the mutex. 如果尝试获取 mutex 的所有权将失败 (例如，在调用方法替换`millisecondsTimeout`或`timeout`参数将返回`false`因为请求超时)，线程不应调用，在此情况下，线程应该也不能访问受互斥体，如以下示例所示的资源。If the attempt to get ownership of the mutex fails (for example, when a call to the method with a `millisecondsTimeout` or a `timeout` parameter returns `false` because the request times out), the thread shouldn't call , In this case, the thread should also not be allowed to access the resource protected by the mutex, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Mutex.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.mutex.class/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Mutex.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.mutex.class/vb/example2.vb#2)] 拥有互斥体的线程可以重复的等待函数调用中指定相同的互斥体，而不会阻止其执行。A thread that owns a mutex can specify the same mutex in repeated wait function calls without blocking its execution. 公共语言运行时保留调用数。The number of calls is kept by the common language runtime. 该线程必须调用相同数量的次数与释放 mutex 的所有权。The thread must call the same number of times to release ownership of the mutex. 如果线程终止时拥有互斥体，则认为该 mutex 已放弃。If a thread terminates while owning a mutex, the mutex is said to be abandoned. 互斥体的状态设置为终止和下一个等待线程获取所有权。The state of the mutex is set to signaled and the next waiting thread gets ownership. 如果没有人拥有该互斥体，互斥体的状态是终止状态。If no one owns the mutex, the state of the mutex is signaled. 从.NET Framework 的版本 2.0获得该互斥体的下一个线程中引发。Beginning in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, an is thrown in the next thread that acquires the mutex. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中之前, 未不引发任何异常。Prior to version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, no exception was thrown. > [!CAUTION] > 放弃的 mutex 通常表明代码中的存在严重错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious error in the code. 线程退出时不释放互斥体，由 mutex 保护的数据结构不可能处于一致状态。When a thread exits without releasing the mutex, the data structures protected by the mutex might not be in a consistent state. 为请求 mutex 所有权的下一个线程可以处理此异常并继续操作，如果可以验证数据结构的完整性。The next thread to request ownership of the mutex can handle this exception and proceed, if the integrity of the data structures can be verified. 对于系统范围的 mutex，放弃的 mutex 可能指示应用程序已突然终止（例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器终止）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, an abandoned mutex might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何本地对象用于同步对受保护资源的访问。The following example shows how a local object is used to synchronize access to a protected resource. 创建互斥体的线程不最初拥有其信息。The thread that creates the mutex does not own it initially. 方法用于在不再需要时释放该互斥。The method is used to release the mutex when it is no longer needed. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Mutex Default Ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Mutex Default Ctor Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Mutex Default Ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Mutex Default Ctor Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Mutex Default Ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Mutex Default Ctor Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户必须具有权限才能调用此方法，而且该互斥体必须使用打开。The user must have rights to call this method, and the mutex must have been opened with . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用访问控制安全性的已命名的互斥体的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named mutex with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的互斥体。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named mutex. 如果不存在该互斥体，创建使用初始所有权以及访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用互斥体的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改该互斥体的权限。If the mutex does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the mutex, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the mutex. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获的异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来读取和更改权限，使用所需的权限打开 mutex和方法。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the mutex with the rights needed to read and change the permissions, using the and methods. 更改权限后，输入，并将其释放所需的权限打开该互斥体。After the permissions are changed, the mutex is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，它运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已命名的 mutex 不存在，此方法不会创建它。If the named mutex does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要创建的系统互斥体已存在时，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system mutex when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果您不确定是否存在已命名的互斥体，使用此方法重载，而不是方法重载，它的 mutex 不存在时引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named mutex exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the mutex does not exist. 多个调用此方法使用的相同值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回这些对象表示同一命名的系统互斥体。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system mutex. 此方法的重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位 OR 运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许线程等待互斥体，并指定标志将允许线程调用方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the mutex, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method. 此方法不会请求 mutex 的所有权。This method does not request ownership of the mutex.
